Values.Text:
Linda Renway Interview

Det. Hare: You were driving with your husband last night on this same road?
L. Renway: Yes, we almost got into an accident then too.
L.R.: I wasn't looking at the time but James got spooked by something and froze up. I had to grab the wheel until he hit the brakes. D.H.: Did he tell you what he saw?
L.R.: He wouldn't talk about it at all, he just took a while to recover. I don't know why he went back here.

Local Interview

Det. Hare: You say you know what happened?
Local: Aye, or at least, what did it. I drive this way often, and I’ve spied this creature out in the night before.

Local: Only rarely, but once I notice ‘im I always pull over so he don’t spot me
D.H.: Could you give a description of the creature?
L.: He’s big… and uh.. real scary-like. Yeah.
D.H.: …Is that all you can describe?
